attributes.long-description:
BIG BUCKS, NO WHAMMIES!" Press Your Luck is game show fun for your PlayStation®3 system! Three contestants compete to win by correctly answering trivia questions to earn “spins” on the Big Board. Whoever ends the game with the highest earnings wins- but avoid the dreaded Whammy or risk losing it all! With a multiplayer mode played on one PS3™ or online through PlayStation®Network, it has never been so much fun to PRESS YOUR LUCK !

FEATURES

Lots of Whammies:The mischievous Whammy character is featured in dozens of animations taunting contestants after stealing their money away.

“True-to-TV” Experience: Favorite elements from TV, including thousands of trivia questions and"spins" on the Big Board combine with authentic theme music for realistic game show fun.

3 Modes of Play: Play Solo, enjoy Multiplayer mode (up to 3 players) on one PS3™ , or play online through PlayStation®Network. .

Voice Chat: Chat with other players using any compatible wireless headset for the PlayStation®3 system.

©2010 Ludia Inc. All rights reserved. ©2010 FremantleMedia North America Inc. All rights reserved. Press Your Luck is a registered trademark of FremantleMedia Operations B.V. Licensed by FremantleMedia Enterprises.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
